about_the_game:
Achievement Collector: Dog - Poo Expansion Pack

In this 2d action shooter, you play as a military bubble soldier that kills Dogs with bubbles.
Shoot the Dogs with BUBBLES! To protect your self.

DLC Features:
Poo
More Dogs
More Fun!
